mapper.insert: insert into object(code, status, name) values (#{code}, #{status}, #{name})
mapper.select: select * from object where name like "%삼성%"
select * from object where name like "%LG%"
select * from object where name like "%MSI%"
select * from object where name like "%애플%"
mapper.update: update object set rentDate=#{rentDate}, returnDate=#{returnDate}, status=#{status},userName=#{userName}, userPhone=#{userPhone} where code=#{code} and name=#{name}
